title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

1 point - wealthiest, most wealthy, very wealthy, richest, most rich, very rich

Note: Other possibilities are acceptable as long as they convey the financial status of Orgetorix (must indicate superlative degree). Possibilities include the following: affluent, loaded, opulent.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

1 point maximum

1 point - wealthiest, most wealthy, very wealthy, richest, most rich, very rich

Note: Other possibilities are acceptable as long as they convey the financial status of Orgetorix (must indicate superlative degree). Possibilities include the following: affluent, loaded, opulent.

Student response earns one of the available points.

1 point maximum

1 point - wealthiest, most wealthy, very wealthy, richest, most rich, very rich

Note: Other possibilities are acceptable as long as they convey the financial status of Orgetorix (must indicate superlative degree). Possibilities include the following: affluent, loaded, opulent.
